Entity.name: fw_agreement
Entity.doc: Defines the agreement. This is the committed agreement. Only non temporary agreements are valid.

Attribute.name: uuid
Attribute.doc: The unique identifier of this agreement

Attribute.name: guid_object
Attribute.doc: The object where this agreement is linked

Attribute.name: id_record
Attribute.doc: The record witle the proof of the agreement. Only for committed agreements

Attribute.name: is_temporary
Attribute.doc: This agreement is waiting for a commit, so its not valid while temporary.

Attribute.name: is_active
Attribute.doc: This agreement is still active or there is a new one that will override it?

Attribute.name: id_validator
Attribute.doc: The id of the person who validates this agreement
